name: Bored
description:
Bored is a simple puzzle game.
The object is to stop your piece on the center space.

The Rules:
1. You win if your piece STOPS on the center space.
2. Once any piece begins moving, it keeps moving until it is blocked by another piece.
3. If any piece is not blocked, it will move off the board.
4. You lose if any piece moves off the board.
5. No diagonal moves are allowed.

Each of the available puzzle packs increase in difficulty level and number of puzzles.

Each puzzle will randomize its orientation (8 possibilities) each time you play it.

All of the puzzles have solutions.
